headline: Business Administrator
summary:
With more than 12 years of consulting experience, I have had the opportunity to develop projects
at different operational and strategic levels in national and international companies in various
sectors. Additionally, I have also been an entrepreneur in the craft beer and brewpub market for
over 5 years. This unique experience has given me skills in entrepreneurship, leadership, financial
management, marketing, and product development that I apply in my current role.
Currently, I work as a project manager in process automation, where I apply my experience in
consulting and entrepreneurship to deliver high-impact results for my clients. I am passionate
about teamwork and always looking to learn and apply new knowledge to improve my
performance and contribute to the success of the companies and people involved.

experiences.title: Project Manager / BPMS and RPA Solution Architect
experiences.description: Project management and solution design for BPMS and RPA development.

experiences.title: Managing Director
experiences.description:
Business Plan Structuring, Market and Growth Strategies.
Short- and Long-Term Finance Management.
HR Management and People Development.
Operational Planning.

experiences.company: Rio 2016 - Comitê Organizador dos Jogos Olímpicos e Paralímpicos
experiences.title: Procurement Manager
experiences.description:
Purchase manager at Rio 2016 Organizing Committee. Responsible for some categories and approvals at the management committee.
Main Purchasing Categories:
o Utility
o Employees and athlete’s transportation
o Home Appliances
o Facilities
o Sports Equipment

experiences.title: Manager Project Management
experiences.description: Main projects description: Structuring the purchasing department for a Brazilian company in Venezuela. Market diagnosis and strategy for instant meals product. Strategic Sourcing projects for categories of logistics, storage and indirect services for one of the largest producers of consumer goods in Brazil. PMO and development of pre-projects in the areas of demand generation, purchasing and logistics for a large wholesaler. Strategic Sourcing of raw materials for a chemical industry. Strategic Sourcing project for the main spending purchase categories, including freight and internal services for an agribusiness.

experiences.title: Project Manager
experiences.description: Mains projects description: Logistic sourcing for e-commerce company. Redesign the logistic network for a pharmaceutical industry. Development of a new remuneration method for logistics contracts. Strategic sourcing project for direct materials such as cast, machined, hydraulic, electrical and plastic parts in a heavy equipment company for agriculture. Supplier market assessment for a German heavy equipment company. Strategic sourcing project for a company in the education sector. Renegotiation of the main services contracts for a shopping mall chain. Development of a highly complex projects such as the analysis of the biomass market in Brazil to be used as an alternative energy source for a beverage industry.

experiences.title: Trainee
experiences.description: Supporting buyers with brazilian purchase items, sourcing of new suppliers and activities on stock control.

accomplishment_projects.title: EY - Supply Redesign
accomplishment_projects.description: Managed a project to develop the purchase structure for a Brazilian company in Venezuela. Project developed in 3 fronts. 1st Market assessment, supplier qualification and development. 2nd Redesign purchase structure. 3rd Develop the supply plan including structuring its organization, processes and tools.

accomplishment_projects.title: Strategic Sourcing
accomplishment_projects.description: Cost Reduction Project of direct materials like castings, machining, hydraulic, electrical and plastic parts for an agricultural heavy equipment manufacturer. The scope involved renegotiating with suppliers including low cost countries (BCC).

accomplishment_projects.title: TCO analysis
accomplishment_projects.description: Developing a differentiated model of remuneration for logistics providers focusing on better usage of equipment with routing the logistics network respecting customer sales seasonality.

accomplishment_projects.title: Market Screening
accomplishment_projects.description: Supplier evaluation and feasibility analysis for a German company with intentions of building a plant in Brazil. The analysis consisted on suppliers sourcing in addition to an extensive qualitative evaluation beyond price negotiation. The feasibility analysis also considered the unit location, all other operational costs as well as labor, taxes and logistics. An analysis on the sale of products via FINAME was also investigated.
